Title: Establishes the New York state celiac disease awareness and research fund
Summary: Establishes the New York state celiac disease awareness and research fund; provides for education on celiac disease awareness.
LawCode: Add §§804-e & 6505-d, Ed L; add §630-i, Tax L; add §95-j, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to education on celiac disease; and to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to the celiac disease awareness and research fund
